name: Qubit Labs Inc.
description: Developer of blockchain-based event ticket system designed for companies dedicated to artistic entertainment and recreation activities. The company's system offers features such as anti-fraud security, frictionless mobile transfers, resale control, and a unique ability to generate new revenue and communication opportunities, enabling large companies and SMEs dedicated to artistic entertainment and recreation activities to control, display and manage smart digital tickets, generating trust and maximizing the transactional experience.
